inclusion.criterion: Patients with and without treatment with statin
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients enrolled in any of the study sites with acute cardiovascular event
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients who have agreed and signed the consent form for the recording and processing of their personal data.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Women in pregnancy or lactation period
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients enrolled in any of the study sites for any reason other than an acute cardiovascular event
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients who discharged and take another statin drug formulation other than the study drug formulation (Antorcin )
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients who have not consented and signed the consent form for the recording and processing of their personal data.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient A is a 30-year-old male with TB symptoms, positive sputum culture, and signs of cavitation on chest X-ray. He has not been vaccinated against TB and does not have any history of illicit drug use.
